alert.note: Alert for Adams; Pike; Scioto (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 7:55AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EAST CENTRAL ADAMS, SOUTHEASTERN PIKE AND SCIOTO COUNTIES THROUGH 830 AM EST... At 755 AM EST, a strong thunderstorm was located 8 miles northeast of Rome, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Portsmouth, Wheelersburg, New Boston, South Webster, Rosemount, Clarktown, Lucasville, Sciotodale, Blue Creek, Beaver, Otway, Wakefield, Minford, Sciotoville, Friendship, Mcdermott, Bear Creek, Lombardsville, Stockdale and West Portsmouth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
